entities.name: gargoyle
entities.description: A stone statue with a face that resembles a human, standing in front of the entrance. It is immovable until Harry says 'Cockroach Cluster'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who tries to enter the building by guessing passwords and eventually succeeds when he says 'Cockroach Cluster'.

relationships.description: Harry tries to guess the password by saying different sweets, but the gargoyle remains immovable until Harry says 'Cockroach Cluster'.
When Harry says 'Cockroach Cluster', the gargoyle springs to life and jumps aside, allowing Harry to enter.
